collectible.title: Dirty Magazine
collectible.subtitle: A magazine full of pictures of women in lingerie.
collectible.text: A raunchy magazine with pages and pages of women in sexy lingerie. You know, the sort of thing people would buy and hoard before the internet.

collectible.title: Science Magazine
collectible.subtitle: A magazine full of very helpful information.
collectible.text: A science magazine full of all sorts of information about how to get to the moon. You feel like it is long past time that this information could have been useful.
collectible.unlock: Play a game where Roll wins after losing her hat.
